QueryDefinition.Query:
DECLARE @sql nvarchar(MAX) DECLARE @field VARCHAR(50)
IF (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = 'LONG_TERM_CARE')) BEGIN SET @field = 'PROV_ID' END ELSE BEGIN SET @field = 'PROVID' END;
SET @sql = N' SELECT DISTINCT A.' + @field + ' AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, A.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM FACILITY_HEADER A WHERE A.' + @field + ' IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT B.' + @field + ' AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, B.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM OUTPATIENT_SERVICES B WHERE B.' + @field + ' IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT C.' + @field + ' AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, C.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM INPATIENT_SERVICES C WHERE C.' + @field + ' IS NOT NULL'
IF (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = 'LONG_TERM_CARE')) BEGIN
SET @sql = @sql + N' UNION SELECT DISTINCT D.PROV_ID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, D.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM LONG_TERM_CARE D WHERE D.PROV_ID IS NOT NULL ' END ELSE BEGIN
SET @sql = @sql + N' UNION SELECT DISTINCT D.PROVID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, D.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM LAB D WHERE D.PROVID IS NOT NULL ' END
EXECUTE sp_executesql @sql;
